hero.title: The Postgres studio built for how you actually work.
hero.subtitle: Keyboard-first. Blazing fast. Actually enjoyable.
hero.description: A database studio that feels like your favorite code editor.
hero.descriptionHighlight: Navigate with shortcuts. Edit with confidence. Ship faster.

differentiators.title: Finally, a database studio that respects your workflow.
differentiators.description: Other studios make you click through menus. Cloak DB lets you

timeMachine.title: Time Machine
timeMachine.description: Save your database state before risky changes. One click to restore. Iterate without fear.

resourceInspector.title: Resource Inspector
resourceInspector.description: Type a user ID, see all related resources instantly. No more writing 15 JOINs to understand what happened.

captureAnonymize.title: Capture & Anonymize
captureAnonymize.description: Pull production data for realistic testing. Automatically anonymize PII. Ship with confidence.

studioFeatures.title: Every action has a shortcut. Every workflow is optimized.
studioFeatures.description: We obsessed over the details so you can focus on building.

features.title: Keyboard-First Navigation
features.description: Cmd+E to search tables, Cmd+J for new queries, W to close tabs, ? for help. Your hands never leave the keyboard.

features.title: Multi-Cell Editing
features.description: Select multiple cells across rows with Cmd+Click. Apply the same change to all of them at once. Batch updates in seconds.

features.title: Smart Command Palette
features.description: Fuzzy search across all your tables. Handles typos gracefully. Shows row counts for context. Navigate your schema instantly.

features.title: Pending Changes System
features.description: All edits are local until you explicitly save. Yellow indicators show unsaved changes. Discard or batch save with Cmd+S.

features.title: Type-Aware Editors
features.description: Boolean toggles, JSON expansion with syntax highlighting, date pickers, numeric validation. The right editor for every data type.

features.title: Shareable Views
features.description: Pagination, sorting, and filters are preserved in the URL. Share exact views with your team. Browser back/forward just works.

problemSolution.problemTitle: Database tools shouldn't slow you down.
problemSolution.problemLine1: You're deep in debugging. You need to check one value, update a row, trace a foreign key.
problemSolution.problemLine2: But your current tool makes you:
problemSolution.problemQuote: Click. Wait. Click. Scroll. Click again.
problemSolution.problemLine3: Menus everywhere. No shortcuts. Context lost every time you switch tabs.
problemSolution.problemConclusion: Your database tool is fighting against your flow.
problemSolution.solutionTitle: A studio that moves at your speed.
problemSolution.solutionLine2: Search tables instantly. Edit cells in place. Navigate with the same shortcuts you use in VS Code. Your database work finally feels like coding.
problemSolution.solutionConclusion: Stay in the flow. Ship faster.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Cloak DB ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.content:
We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
• Sign up for early access
• Contact us through our website
• Subscribe to our newsletter

This information may include: email address, name, and company information.

usageData.title: 2.2 Usage Data
usageData.content:
We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website, including:
• IP address
• Browser type and version
• Pages visited and time spent
• Referring website
• Device information

cookies.title: 2.3 Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. You can control cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content:
We use the information we collect to:
• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Send you updates about Cloak DB
• Respond to your inquiries and support requests
• Analyze usage patterns and improve user experience
• Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
• Comply with legal obligations

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
• With your consent
• With service providers who help us operate our website (e.g., analytics providers)
• To comply with legal obligations
• To protect our rights and prevent fraud

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights (Quebec Law 25 Compliance)
yourRights.content:
Under Quebec's Law 25, you have the following rights:
• Right to access your personal information
• Right to rectification of inaccurate information
• Right to deletion of your personal information
• Right to data portability
• Right to withdraw consent at any time
• Right to object to processing

To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@cloakdb.com.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

internationalTransfers.title: 8. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

Email: privacy@cloakdb.com

description.content: Cloak DB is an open-source tool for database schema capture, anonymization, and test data generation. The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind.

license.content: Cloak DB software is licensed under the MIT License. You are free to use, modify, and distribute the software in accordance with the license terms available in our GitHub repository.

userResponsibilities.content:
